abstract: Editorial maintains that states and cities need more federal help to protect vulnerable citizens and curb homelessness; urges Congress to fully finance the Department of Housing and Urban Development and its important housing programs.
snippet: States and cities need more federal help to protect vulnerable citizens and curb homelessness. Congress should fully finance important housing programs.
lead_paragraph: States and cities need more federal help to protect vulnerable citizens and curb homelessness. Congress should fully finance important housing programs.

headline.main: A Foolish Time to Cut Housing Aid
headline.print_headline: A Foolish Time to Cut Housing Aid
headline.seo: A Foolish Time to Cut Housing Aid
